channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Some Native Americans draw shocked response over contract to design immigration detention centers
item.description: The Prairie Band Potawatomi Nation, whose ancestors were uprooted by the U.S. from the Great Lakes region in the 1830s, are facing outrage from fellow...

item.title: How Euthanasia Gained a Foothold in Hospice Care
item.description: The concept of hospice was originally sold to the public as a better way to treat patients with terminal disease. The mission has been hijacked.

item.title: Karoline Leavitt's relative after detained by ICE: 'When does it stop?'
item.description: The mother of Karoline Leavitt's nephew addressed the White House press secretary in her first TV interview since being detained by Immigration and Cu...

item.title: The Florida Highwaymen: Outsider Art, Tourism, and American Landscape
item.description: The fascinating story of black artists whose flamboyant colors, ocean waves, and swaying palms defined Florida for a generation of tourists.

item.title: The Complicated Legacy of Frank Gehry’s Work
item.description: The legendary architect, who died last week, was an artist of self-expression.

item.title: Another peace meeting set for U.S., European, Ukrainian officials
item.description: U.S. special envoy Steve Witkoff, President Trump's son-in-law Jared Kushner and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy will reportedly meet in Germa...

item.title: 'Unacceptable': Republicans frustrated with FDA chief Makary's lack of answers on abortion pill
item.description: Senate Republicans want to know what's going on with the abortion pill behind the scenes at the Food and Drug Administration, but Commissioner Marty M...

item.title: Trump’s China Chip Deal and the Sale of American National Security
item.description: If letting China buy precious tech is detrimental to U.S. interests, that threat is not mitigated by allowing the Treasury to grab a quarter of the in...

item.title: Appeals court allows Planned Parenthood defunding in 'huge' win for Trump administration
item.description: Score one for the Trump administration in its bid to cut off federal funding to Planned Parenthood.

item.title: Indiana’s Redistricting Surrender Illustrates Why Primaries Matter
item.description: The phrase, “I voted Republican and all I got was this dumb t-shirt,” is a good summation of the disappointment that comes with supporting the feckles...

item.title: Pritzker Signs Law Welcoming State-Sanctioned Suicide To Illinois
item.description: State-sanctioned euthanasia not only pressures patients to choose suicide, but also inevitably ends in health care systems forcing suicide on patients...

item.title: Sen. Ron Johnson Asks DOJ To Investigate Judge Accused Of Misconduct In Trump Lawyers’ Trial
item.description: A judge with a 'grudge' against one of the defendants allegedly ghostwrote Wisconsin Judge John Hyland's August order denying a dismissal motion.

item.title: The Mind-Boggling Saga of Kilmar Abrego Garcia
item.description: This seems to have been epic government incompetence.

item.title: ADF: Employees Can’t Be Forced To Lie About Pronouns At Work
item.description: Employees don't have to insist on calling people by pronouns they don’t like. But they don’t have to say something they know is not true.

item.title: If Time Magazine Weren’t So Corrupt, It Would Have Made Charlie Kirk Person Of The Year
item.description: TIME could have used the credibility that choosing him would have helped restore.
